an1.278-286:4.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve rājāno cakkavattī apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ.
an1.278-286:4.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā eko rājā cakkavattī uppajjeyya.
an1.278-286:6.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho.
an1.278-286:6.3: Ṭhānañca kho, etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho.
an1.278-286:8.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī rājā assa cakkavattī.
an1.278-286:8.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso rājā assa cakkavattī.
an1.278-286:10.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ itthī sakkattaṃ kāreyya … pe … mārattaṃ kāreyya … pe … brahmattaṃ kāreyya.
an1.278-286:10.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ puriso sakkattaṃ kāreyya … pe … mārattaṃ kāreyya … pe … brahmattaṃ kāreyya.
an1.278-286:12.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya.
an1.278-286:12.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ kāyaduccaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya.
an1.278-286:14.1: “Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ vacīduccaritassa … pe … yaṃ manoduccaritassa iṭṭho kanto manāpo vipāko nibbatteyya.
an1.278-286:14.3: Ṭhānañca kho etaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ manoduccaritassa aniṭṭho akanto amanāpo vipāko nibbatteyya.
